entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
